flavor: "I do not need to defend my decisions."
name: Magneto
text: Magnetic Pull — Action: Discard cards from the top of your deck until a [[Magnetic]] card is discarded → add that card to your hand. (Limit once per round.)

flavor: "All that I've endured, and everything I've done, it was all to preserve mutantkind."
name: Erik Lehnsherr
text: Survivor — Response: After you change to this form, shuffle the top 3 cards of your discard pile into your deck.

flavor: "It took considerable effort to rebuild my home. Let's not destroy it again." —Magneto
name: Asteroid M
text: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Asteroid M → shuffle the topmost [[Magnetic]] card in your discard pile into your deck and heal 1 damage from your identity.

flavor: Magneto's helmet protects him from telepathic attacks.
name: Magneto's Helmet
text: Magneto gains steady. Resource: Exhaust Magneto's Helmet → generate a [wild] resource for a [[Magnetic]] card.

name: Magneto's Armor
text: Response: After you resolve your "Magnetic Pull" ability, if you discarded at least 1 of the following resource icons: [mental] — Magneto gets +1 THW this round. [physical] — Magneto gets +1 ATK this round. [energy] — Magneto gets +1 DEF this round.

name: Electromagnetic Blast
text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 3 threat from a scheme. If this removes the last threat from that scheme, you may discard an attachment with the text "Hero Action" or "Hero Response."

flavor: "The way to defend mutants is to defeat our enemies." —Magneto
name: Metal Shards
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 7 damage to an enemy. If this attack defeats that enemy, gain a tough status card.

flavor: "Joining the X-Men means joining a family. It means you're never truly alone."
name: Phoenix
text: Response: After Phoenix enters play, choose an [[X-Men]] ally → ready that ally and heal 1 damage from it.

name: Cyclops
text: Response: After Cyclops enters play, choose an enemy. Until the end of the phase, increase the amount of damage that enemy takes from each attack by 1.

name: Won't Stay Down
text: Play only if your identity has the [[X-Force]] or [[X-Men]] trait. Max 1 per player. Alter-Ego Action: Discard this card → return an [[X-Force]] or [[X-Men]] ally from your discard pile to your hand.

name: Noble Sacrifice
text: Hero Action: Discard an ally you control → heal damage from your hero equal to that ally's printed hit points and give your hero a tough status card.

flavor: The dream of every student at Xavier's school is to join the X-Men.
name: New Recruits
text: Victory 0. Play only if your identity has the [[X-Men]] trait. When Defeated: Each player chooses 1 set-aside [[New]] ally and adds it to their hand.

flavor: "It's hard to be a kid when you look like a monster."
name: Anole
text:
Linked (New Recruits).
If you have the [[Mutant]] or [[X-Men]] trait, Anole gets +1 THW and does not count against your ally limit.
